remedies.preparation: For stress and anxiety, take 1-2 teaspoons of Ashwagandha root powder mixed with a cup of warm milk before bed. A pinch of cardamom can be added for better digestion and flavor. Consistent use for at least 3 months is recommended for adaptogenic benefits.
remedies.source: Synthetic PDF - Ayurvedic Pharmacopoeia Vol. II

remedies.preparation: To reduce anxiety and calm the mind, consume 2-3 fresh Brahmi leaves daily on an empty stomach. Alternatively, take 1/2 teaspoon of Brahmi powder with ghee or honey.
remedies.source: Synthetic PDF - Sushruta Samhita on Medhya Rasayana

remedies.preparation: For stress reduction, brew a tea with 5-6 fresh Tulsi leaves in hot water for 5 minutes. Drink 2-3 cups daily to help calm the nervous system.

For fevers and to boost immunity, boil a 4-6 inch piece of fresh Giloy stem in 2 cups of water until it reduces to 1 cup. Drink this decoction twice a day. This is particularly useful for chronic fevers.
remedies.source: Synthetic PDF - Ashtanga Hridayam on Jwara Chikitsa

remedies.scientificName: Piper nigrum, Piper longum, Zingiber officinale
remedies.preparation: To clear respiratory congestion and relieve a cold, mix 1/4 teaspoon of Trikatu powder with 1 teaspoon of honey and take it 15-20 minutes before meals. This blend acts as a powerful decongestant.
remedies.source: Synthetic PDF - Sharangdhara Samhita on Agni Deepana

remedies.preparation: To relieve cold symptoms and fever, boil a few fresh stalks of Lemongrass in water to make a therapeutic tea. Its warming nature helps balance Kapha dosha.

remedies.scientificName: Terminalia chebula, Terminalia bellirica, Phyllanthus emblica
remedies.preparation: For constipation and to promote healthy digestion, mix 1 teaspoon of Triphala powder in a glass of warm water and drink it before bedtime. This acts as a gentle, non-habit-forming laxative.
remedies.source: Synthetic PDF - Charaka Samhita on Rasayana Therapy

remedies.preparation: To alleviate bloating and indigestion, boil 1 teaspoon of coriander seeds in a cup of water for 5 minutes. Strain and drink the tea after meals.
For indigestion, nausea, or gas, steep 8-10 fresh mint leaves in a cup of hot water for 5-7 minutes. This soothing tea pacifies an upset stomach.

For joint pain and inflammation, drink 'Golden Milk'. Mix 1/2 teaspoon of turmeric powder and a pinch of black pepper (to increase absorption) in a cup of warm milk. For topical relief, a paste of turmeric powder and water can be applied to the affected joint.
remedies.source: Synthetic PDF - Charaka Samhita Chapter on Haridra

remedies.preparation: The anti-inflammatory properties of Ashwagandha can help with joint pain. Take 1-2 teaspoons of the root powder with warm milk daily. This also helps strengthen the muscles supporting the joints.
remedies.source: Synthetic PDF - Ayurvedic Pharmacopoeia Vol. II

remedies.preparation: To enhance memory and concentration, take 1/2 teaspoon of Brahmi powder mixed with a teaspoon of ghee or honey on an empty stomach in the morning. Consistent use for at least 3 months is recommended.
remedies.source: Synthetic PDF - Sushruta Samhita on Medhya Rasayana

remedies.preparation: As a tonic for the mind (Medhya Rasayana), Ashwagandha can improve cognitive function. Take 1 teaspoon of the root powder with warm milk daily.
remedies.source: Synthetic PDF - Ayurvedic Pharmacopoeia Vol. II

remedies.preparation: For acne, eczema, or pigmentation, take 1/2 teaspoon of Manjistha powder with warm water twice a day after meals. For external use, a face pack can be made by mixing Manjistha powder with honey or rose water.
remedies.source: Synthetic PDF - Dhanvantari Nighantu on Raktashodhak Herbs

remedies.preparation: For skin allergies and infections, a paste of fresh Neem leaves can be applied topically. Neem leaf tea (boil 5-7 leaves in water) can be consumed for internal blood purification, but it is very bitter.
For glowing skin and detoxification, consume 1-2 fresh Amla fruits daily or take 1 teaspoon of Amla powder with warm water in the morning.
